question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Vehicle Protection Devices, Malibu Park Drainage Improvements, Annual Street Maintenance, City Hall Roof Replacement, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain, Birdview Avenue Improvements, Outdoor Warning Sirens, Guardrail Replacement Citywide, PCH Median Improvements Project, PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure
evidence_answer: Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Vehicle Protection Devices Malibu Park Drainage Improvements, Annual Street Maintenance, City Hall Roof Replacement, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain, Birdview Avenue Improvements, Outdoor Warning Sirens, Guardrail Replacement Citywide, PCH Median Improvements Project, PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure
